content: ut her fear of wolves - she believes it stems from a childhood memory of being hunted by such a creature. Shadowheart decided to share an old memory with us - one of a few spared from her amnesia. We saw her as a lost child, being pursued by a wolf through a dark forest. Some Shar worshippers, led by the masked Mother Superior, came to her rescue and took her into their care.
